docs.snippet: LIMA, Peru, Dec. 3.--The twenty Latin-American republics are coming to the eighth international conference of American States, which opens here next Friday, with more enthusiasm and more hope of concrete results than they have felt for any previous...
docs.lead_paragraph: LIMA, Peru, Dec. 3.--The twenty Latin-American republics are coming to the eighth international conference of American States, which opens here next Friday, with more enthusiasm and more hope of concrete results than they have felt for any previous Pan American Conference.
